name: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, olive oil
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake in oven.

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan, Caesar dressing, chicken
instructions: Toss ingredients with dressing and top with grilled chicken.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan, black pepper
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with eggs and pancetta, then top with parmesan and pepper.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, eggs, chocolate chips
instructions: Mix ingredients, shape into cookies, and bake at 350Â°F for 10-12 mins.

name: Beef Burger
ingredients: Ground beef, buns, lettuce, tomato, cheese, ketchup
instructions: Grill patty, assemble with toppings in a bun.

name: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, butter, sugar, baking powder
instructions: Mix batter, pour onto griddle, flip when bubbles form, and serve with syrup.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Taco shells, ground beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream
instructions: Cook beef with spices, fill shells with beef and toppings.

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, olive oil
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake in oven.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: Broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, soy sauce, garlic, sesame oil
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in oil and sauce until crisp-tender.

name: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: Salmon fillets, lemon, dill, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: Season salmon and grill until flaky. Serve with lemon slices.

name: Pancakes with Berries
ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, sugar, baking powder, berries, maple syrup
instructions: Mix batter, cook pancakes, top with fresh berries and syrup.

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan, Caesar dressing, chicken
instructions: Toss ingredients with dressing and top with grilled chicken.

name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: Bread, avocado, lemon juice, salt, pepper, chili flakes
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon and seasonings, spread.

name: Lentil Soup
ingredients: Lentils, onion, garlic, carrot, celery, spices, broth
instructions: Simmer lentils with vegetables and spices until tender.

name: Cheese Burger
ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla, chocolate chips
instructions: Mix ingredients, shape dough, bake until golden brown.
